00035 #include <dttspagc.h>
00036 
00037 #ifdef min
00038 #undef min
00039 #endif /*  */
00040 
00041 static INLINE REAL min( REAL a, REAL b )
00042 {
00043     return a < b ? a : b;
00044 }
00045 
00046 #ifdef max
00047 #undef max
00048 #endif /*  */
00049 
00050 static INLINE REAL max( REAL a, REAL b )
00051 {
00052     return a > b ? a : b;
00053 }
00054 
00055 DTTSPAGC newDttSPAgc( AGCMODE mode, COMPLEX * Vec, int BufSize, REAL Limit,
00056                       REAL attack, REAL decay, REAL slope, REAL hangtime,
00057                       REAL samprate, REAL MaxGain, REAL MinGain, REAL CurGain,
00058                       char *tag )
00059 {
00060     DTTSPAGC a;
00061 
00062     a = ( DTTSPAGC ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( dttspagc ), tag );
00063     a->mode = mode;
00064 
00065     a->attack = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( attack * samprate ) ) );
00066     a->one_m_attack = ( REAL ) exp( -1000.0 / ( attack * samprate ) );
00067 
00068     a->decay = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( decay * samprate ) ) );
00069     a->one_m_decay = ( REAL ) exp( -1000.0 / ( decay * samprate ) );
00070 
00071     a->fastattack = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( 0.2 * samprate ) ) );
00072     a->one_m_fastattack = ( REAL ) exp( -1000.0 / ( 0.2 * samprate ) );
00073 
00074     a->fastdecay = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( 3.0 * samprate ) ) );
00075     a->one_m_fastdecay = ( REAL ) exp( -1000.0 / ( 3.0 * samprate ) );
00076 
00077     strcpy( a->tag, tag );
00078     a->mask = 2 * BufSize;
00079 
00080     a->hangindex = a->indx = 0;
00081     a->hangtime = hangtime * 0.001;
00082     a->hangthresh = 0.0;
00083     a->sndx = ( int ) ( samprate * attack * 0.003 );
00084     a->fastindx = FASTLEAD;
00085     a->gain.fix = 10.0;
00086 
00087     a->slope = slope;
00088     a->gain.top = MaxGain;
00089     a->hangthresh = a->gain.bottom = MinGain;
00090     a->gain.fastnow = a->gain.old = a->gain.now = CurGain;
00091 
00092     a->gain.limit = Limit;
00093 
00094     a->buff = newCXB( BufSize, Vec, "agc in buffer" );
00095     a->circ = newvec_COMPLEX( a->mask, "circular agc buffer" );
00096     a->mask -= 1;
00097 
00098     a->fasthang = 0;
00099     a->fasthangtime = 48 * 0.001;
00100     a->samprate = samprate;
00101 
00102     return a;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void DttSPAgc( DTTSPAGC a, int tick )
00106 {
00107     int i,
00108         hangtime = ( int ) ( a->samprate * a->hangtime ),
00109         fasthangtime = ( int ) ( a->samprate * a->fasthangtime );
00110     REAL hangthresh;
00111 
00112     if ( a->hangthresh > 0 )
00113         hangthresh =
00114             a->gain.top * a->hangthresh + a->gain.bottom * ( REAL ) ( 1.0 -
00115                                                                       a->
00116                                                                       hangthresh );
00117     else
00118         hangthresh = 0.0;
00119 
00120     if ( a->mode == 0 )
00121     {
00122         for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( a->buff ); i++ )
00123             CXBdata( a->buff, i ) =
00124                 Cscl( CXBdata( a->buff, i ), a->gain.fix );
00125         return;
00126     }
00127 
00128     for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( a->buff ); i++ )
00129     {
00130         REAL tmp;
00131 
00132         a->circ[a->indx] = CXBdata( a->buff, i );   /* Drop sample into circular buffer */
00133         tmp = 1.1 * Cmag( a->circ[a->indx] );
00134 
00135         if ( tmp != 0.0 )
00136             tmp = a->gain.limit / tmp;  // if not zero sample, calculate gain
00137         else
00138             tmp = a->gain.now;  // update. If zero, then use old gain
00139 
00140         if ( tmp < hangthresh )
00141             a->hangindex = hangtime;
00142 
00143         if ( tmp >= a->gain.now )
00144         {
00145             a->gain.raw = a->one_m_decay * a->gain.now + a->decay * tmp;
00146             if ( a->hangindex++ > hangtime )
00147                 a->gain.now =
00148                     a->one_m_decay * a->gain.now +
00149                     a->decay * min( a->gain.top, tmp );
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153             a->hangindex = 0;
00154             a->gain.raw = a->one_m_attack * a->gain.now + a->attack * tmp;
00155             a->gain.now =
00156                 a->one_m_attack * a->gain.now + a->attack * max( tmp,
00157                                                                  a->gain.
00158                                                                  bottom );
00159         }
00160 
00161         tmp = 1.2f * Cmag( a->circ[a->fastindx] );
00162         if ( tmp != 0.0 )
00163             tmp = a->gain.limit / tmp;
00164         else
00165             tmp = a->gain.fastnow;
00166 
00167         if ( tmp > a->gain.fastnow )
00168         {
00169             if ( a->fasthang++ > fasthangtime )
00170             {
00171                 a->gain.fastnow =
00172                     min( a->one_m_fastdecay * a->gain.fastnow +
00173                          a->fastdecay * min( a->gain.top, tmp ),
00174                          a->gain.top );
00175             }
00176         }
00177         else
00178         {
00179             a->fasthang = 0;
00180             a->gain.fastnow =
00181                 max( a->one_m_fastattack * a->gain.fastnow +
00182                      a->fastattack * max( tmp, a->gain.bottom ),
00183                      a->gain.bottom );
00184         }
00185 
00186         a->gain.fastnow =
00187             max( min( a->gain.fastnow, a->gain.top ), a->gain.bottom );
00188         a->gain.now = max( min( a->gain.now, a->gain.top ), a->gain.bottom );
00189         CXBdata( a->buff, i ) =
00190             Cscl( a->circ[a->sndx],
00191                   min( a->gain.fastnow,
00192                        min( a->slope * a->gain.now, a->gain.top ) ) );
00193 
00194         a->indx = ( a->indx + a->mask ) & a->mask;
00195         a->sndx = ( a->sndx + a->mask ) & a->mask;
00196         a->fastindx = ( a->fastindx + a->mask ) & a->mask;
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 void delDttSPAgc( DTTSPAGC a )
00201 {
00202     if ( a )
00203     {
00204         delCXB( a->buff );
00205         delvec_COMPLEX( a->circ );
00206         safefree( ( char * ) a );
00207     }
00208 }
